full_summary:
**
Government Tender Announcement: Access Control System Replacement at Fort Frances Port of Entry

**Summary:**

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking proposals for the replacement of its existing access control system at the Fort Frances Port of Entry (POE) in Ontario. The new system will include computers, software, hardware, wiring, and maintenance services.

**Trade Agreements and Regions:**

This tender is subject to the provisions of the following trade agreements:

- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

The tender is open to bidders in the Ontario region, excluding the National Capital Region.

**Contract Security Clearance:**

The contractor must hold a valid Facility Security Clearance at the level of SECRET, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

**Solicitation Documents and Timeline:**

- **Notice of Proposed Procurement:** Published on CanadaBuys
- **Request for Proposal (RFP) Document:** Will be directly sent to qualified Supply Arrangement Holders under the E60HN-200ACS series
- **Site Visit:** Scheduled for September 20, 2023; bidders must confirm attendance before September 18, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** October 5, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST)
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 17, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Debriefings:**

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within 15 working days of receiving the results.

**Tendering Method:**

This is a competitive, traditional tendering process.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The contract will be awarded to the bidder offering the lowest price.

**Attachment:**

The RFP document is available for download at the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/12091/1000462221--rfp-amend-2.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/12091/1000462221--rfp-amend-2.pdf)
